mapper.select: select * from Visitjeju_table order by vi_hit desc limit 20
select count(*) from Like_table l inner join Visitjeju_table v on v.contentsid = l.contentsid where l.contentsid = #{contentsid}
select count(*) from Board_table b inner join Visitjeju_table v on v.contentsid = b.contentsid where b.contentsid = #{contentsid}
select count(*) from Review_table r inner join Visitjeju_table v on v.contentsid = r.contentsid where r.contentsid = #{contentsid} and r.rep_status = 0
select * from Visitjeju_table where vi_title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
mapper.insert: insert into Board_table(u_idx, contentsid, bo_writer, bo_title, bo_content, bo_regdate, disclosure) values(#{u_idx}, #{contentsid}, #{u_name}, #{bo_title}, #{bo_content}, sysdate(), #{disclosure})

insert into Review_table(u_idx, u_id, contentsid, u_profile_img, u_name, re_content, re_grade, re_regdate) values(#{u_idx}, #{u_id}, #{contentsid}, #{u_profile_img}, #{u_name}, #{re_content}, #{re_grade}, sysdate())

SELECT (IFNULL(MAX(re_idx),0)) as re_idx FROM Review_table
INSERT INTO Picture_table (re_idx, pic_file) VALUES (#{re_idx}, #{pic_file})

insert into Report_table(u_idx, re_idx, m_idx, m_id, m_name, report_title, report_content, report_writer, report_regdate) values(#{u_idx}, #{re_idx}, #{m_idx}, #{m_id}, #{m_name}, #{report_title}, #{report_content}, #{report_writer}, sysdate())
mapper.select: select AVG(re_grade) from Review_table where contentsid = #{contentsid} and rep_status = 0
mapper.delete: delete from Like_table where u_idx = #{u_idx} AND contentsid = #{contentsid}
mapper.insert: insert into Comment_table(bo_idx, com_writer, com_content, com_regdate) values(#{bo_idx}, #{com_writer}, #{com_content}, sysdate())
